/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a natural canopy over the road. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still image. In the distance, a building with a red roof stands out against the blue sky, its vibrant color contrasting with the greenery around it. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
